text: Genoni (Jaròi, Geròni) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 832 people lived there. Its area is 43.79 km². It is 447 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Genoni
